Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

: : Lunekill : :

From somewhere in the vastness of space, a telepathic signal is transmitted. It reaches Rockseeker on Earth, through the barrier of linear time.

*It has been along time since you have contacted me brother. I will come to aid you. Soon we will be together, to serve our lord.*

OOC: I'm not sure of her alt mode and all right now. I'm still working on the first sketch of her design. I'll probably make some changes and do another then come up with a final copy.


Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:
Boulders had literally buried him. He was aching from the injuries he 
had suffered, but it was a good sign - he was still online. However, 
he was also depleted.

He tried to push himself out of the rubbles, but found that he could 
not. He then resorted to doing what he didn't want to; calling out to 
his sister.

Rockseeker: Sister Lunekill, do you hear me? I'm trapped under a pile 
of rock. Care to lend a hand?
